import './App.css' import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' var x = "foo" const interaction_swi = (inter) => { switch (inter) { case 'menu': return( <>
food
bath
play
) case 'food': return( <>
food1
food2
food3
food4
back
) case 'bath': return( <>
bath1
bath2
bath3
bath4
back
) case 'play': return( <>
play1
play2
play3
play4
back
) } } function App() { return (
name
happiness
health
hunger
setting
house
{interaction_swi(x)}
); } export default App;
